tile.description: An autonomous platform to intelligently manage your cloud applications
tile.title: Sedai

media.caption: Sedai continuously optimizes all your functions in production for heightened performance.
Sedai autonomously optimizes your Lambda functions for heightened performance. Decreases in duration means a faster lambda for you.
Sedai allows you to define optimization parameters as a global setting or at the individual function level. Cost or Performance, or Both!
Sedai autonomously sets and maintains SLOs for any application or function.
Sedai analyses releases into production and scores them based on performance comparative to your last release, errors, timeouts, duration, etc.
Pick and choose which remediations you want Sedai to run in production for you.
Sedai populates an OOTB Dashboard so you can visualize all the actions Sedai takes right in Datadog!

pricing.short_description: Monthly license for up to 13 Million invocations.
